Headline: Southbound Temporary #54B South Cicero Reroute near Cicero/Cermak
ShortDescription: Southbound 54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Cermak, Kenton and Cermak due to street blockage near Cicero/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Cermak, Kenton and Cermak due to street blockage near Cicero/Cermak.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute near Brainard/137th
ShortDescription: #30 South Chicago buses rerouted; Southbound buses will operate via Avenue O, 135th and Baltimore. Northbound buses will operate via Baltimore and Brainard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near  Brainard/137th, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Avenue O, 135th and Baltimore.

Northbound buses will operate via Baltimore and Brainard.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting Red Line and Green Line Trains
ShortDescription: Trains are running with delays from weather conditions with longer than usual travel times. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Trains are running with delays from weather conditions with longer than usual travel times.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes.

Crews are working to clear tracks and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
